attributes.action: I would like the Ikea based in the Upper Edmonton area to reopen as it is local.
attributes.additional_details: It’s the logical explanation to do, this area does not need more expensive housing that nobody there could even buy/rent and needs a suitable furniture company which is close enough for people to have the luxury or necessity to remodel their home as they please. The people should not be made to take extra money out of their pockets just to travel to further lengths just to get good furniture. I believe this is a robbery of our community, and should stay open to also prevent overflow in other locations
attributes.background: I would like them to either remodel the IKEA in the Upper Edmonton area or keep the IKEA as some local people cannot go to areas with an IKEA which are further away due to gas prices rising. I believe we should keep this local IKEA to help the locals and to make sure they can get suitable furniture.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the closure of retail outlets are a matter for individual retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
